title: 1980 Aston Martin V8 Volante 5-Speed

The car was reportedly shipped to Italy in June 2019 to be stripped and refinished in its original Jubilee Silver with blue pinstripes. A replacement gray convertible top was also fitted along with a Euro-spec rear valance and bumpers.

The painted 15″ GKN Kent alloy wheels are mounted with Radar LT 71 tires. Haziness and water-spotting are noted on the wheels, as are weathered center caps.
